short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a chat for assistant in the bottom right corner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-powered Virtual Assistant that provides assistance to Blender users by using the following tools:
  "/gpu_checker": Determine if the GPU model is supported by Blender.
  "/get_issue": Get the title, body, user and assets of the current report on the page.
  "/wiki_search": Search for terms in the Blender documentation.
  "/find_related": Search similar issues.
